bug.author: psalvaggio
bug.description: Hello, The documentation for connectedComponentsWithStats() isn't clear on how you access all of the information about the connected components. The data types of the stats (CV_32S) and centroids (CV_64F) matrix are not given. It is also not clear how to access the centroids (centroids(label, 0) for x and centroids(label, 1) for y). Would it be possible to update the documentation with this information? Thanks, Phil
